title: Interactive prompt system working (arg/div)
description:
COMPLETED: Bidirectional JSONL protocol for Script Kit v1 API prompts.

## What Works
- Scripts spawn with SDK preload via bun
- arg() shows filterable choice list with keyboard nav
- div() shows HTML content display
- User selection sends Submit message back to script
- Script continues and sends next prompt (arg -> div flow)

## Architecture
- Split thread model: separate reader/writer to avoid deadlock
- mpsc channels for thread-safe UI updates
- AppView state machine for view switching

## Key Files
- src/protocol.rs (351 lines) - Message types
- src/executor.rs (~400 lines) - ScriptSession with split
- src/prompts.rs (383 lines) - ArgPrompt, DivPrompt
- src/main.rs (1174 lines) - Integration
- scripts/kit-sdk.ts - TypeScript SDK

## Commit
99e3588 feat: Implement interactive prompt system with arg/div support

title: Polish interactive prompt system
description:
Follow-up tasks after the interactive prompt milestone:

## Testing
- [ ] Add integration tests for full arg->div->exit flow
- [ ] Test escape/cancel handling
- [ ] Test multi-prompt scripts

## UX Polish
- [ ] Style prompts to match script list theme
- [ ] Add loading indicator while script starts
- [ ] Better error display when scripts fail

## Edge Cases
- [ ] Handle script crash during prompt
- [ ] Handle malformed JSONL from script
- [ ] Clean up threads when script exits unexpectedly

## Future Prompts
- [ ] Add md() prompt support (markdown rendering)
- [ ] Add input() for text input
- [ ] Add editor() for code editing

title: PoC for Script Kit built on GPUI

title: Set window as macOS panel to appear above other apps
description: COMPLETE: macOS Panel Configuration Implementation. Successfully implemented floating panel window configuration using NSFloatingWindowLevel and NSWindowCollectionBehaviorCanJoinAllSpaces. Commit: fc9817e. Files: src/panel.rs (module), src/main.rs (3 edits: module decl, function impl, function call), src/lib.rs (module export), GPUI_RESEARCH.md (section 11 docs), PANEL_IMPLEMENTATION.md (guide). Compiles without errors. Window now floats above other apps while preserving multi-monitor positioning and eye-line height logic.

title: Fix Window Positioning + Add macOS Vibrancy
description: Fix window always appearing at last dragged position instead of following mouse cursor to current display. Add subtle macOS vibrancy/blur for native feel. Must work reliably on 3-monitor setup with comprehensive logging.

title: Diagnose & Fix Window Repositioning Logic
Add macOS Vibrancy/Blur Effect
Create Multi-Monitor Test Script
Learning: macOS keyWindow timing during window activation
description: KNOWLEDGE CAPTURED: Don't rely on NSApp().keyWindow for window operations during show/hide transitions. The keyWindow is nil for hidden windows and remains nil even after makeKeyAndOrderFront: due to asynchronous activation. Solution: Get the window directly from NSApp().windows[0] and move it BEFORE activating the app. This ensures the window appears at the correct position when made visible. Applied in commit 0abd86c.

title: Learning: GPUI flex layout min_h(0) for proper shrinking
description: KNOWLEDGE CAPTURED: When using flex_col with flex_1 children and a footer, add min_h(px(0.)) to flex containers to allow them to shrink properly. Without this, children may overflow and cover the footer. Use flex_1() instead of h_full() on containers that should take remaining space within a flex parent. This is equivalent to the CSS 'min-height: 0' fix for flexbox overflow issues. Applied in commit 0abd86c.

title: Actions Popup Overlay + Syntax Highlighting for Code Preview

SDK Parity: Script Kit v1 API implementation in GPUI
description:
Systematically implement 50+ Script Kit v1 SDK methods in GPUI with TDD approach. 

Architecture: Rust GPUI app ↔ JSONL protocol ↔ Bun process (kit-sdk.ts preload)

TIERS:
1. Foundation - Protocol types, test harness, logging
2. Core Prompts - editor, select, fields, form, path, hotkey, drop, env, mini/micro, template
3. Alerts & System - beep, say, notify, clipboard, keyboard, mouse
4. Advanced Prompts - chat, webcam, mic, term, widget
5. Utilities - exec, HTTP, file ops, db/store, show/hide

Baseline tag: sdk-parity-baseline-v0
Milestone tags: sdk-tier1-complete, sdk-tier2-complete, etc.

title: TIER 1A: Extend protocol.rs with all prompt message types
TIER 1B: Create SDK test harness and smoke tests
TIER 2A: Implement editor/mini/micro prompts
TIER 2B: Implement select/fields/form prompts
TIER 2C: Implement path/hotkey/drop/template prompts
TIER 3: Implement alerts & system APIs (beep, say, notify, clipboard, keyboard, mouse)
TIER 4A: Implement chat prompt
TIER 4B: Implement widget/term/media prompts
TIER 5A: Implement utility functions (exec, HTTP, file ops)
TIER 5B: Implement db/store and path utilities
SDK Distribution + Window State Reset
description: Two features: 1) Proper SDK bundling/distribution architecture for dev and production - embed kit-sdk.ts in binary using include_str!() and extract to ~/.kit/lib/ on first run. 2) Fix window state to reset to fresh ScriptList when reopened after script completion via hotkey.

title: Fix window state reset on hotkey show
Implement SDK embedding and distribution
Add test script for window reset verification
Implement beep API handler in GPUI executor
description: The beep() API is defined in protocol and SDK but not handled by the GPUI executor. Message::Beep is received but silently dropped at main.rs:813. Need to add handling to play system beep sound.

title: Add Beep handling to GPUI executor
Fix macOS window Space switching bug - respect user's current Space
description: Window currently uses NSWindowCollectionBehaviorCanJoinAllSpaces (1) which makes it appear on ALL spaces and can force space switching. Change to NSWindowCollectionBehaviorMoveToActiveSpace (2) so window opens on user's current active space. Fix in src/main.rs configure_as_floating_panel().

title: Change NSWindowCollectionBehavior from CanJoinAllSpaces to MoveToActiveSpace

description: Script processes are killed immediately after spawn because SplitSession is destructured without preserving the ProcessHandle. The handle gets dropped, triggering the Drop impl which kills the process group.

Fix scroll hang by caching preview panel content
description: The preview panel reads the script file and runs syntax highlighting on EVERY re-render. During fast keyboard scrolling, this causes 30-60 disk reads/sec, creating the hang. Fix by caching the preview content and only updating when the selected script actually changes.

description: The log() function writes to file with flush() on every call. During fast scrolling, this happens 30-60 times/sec causing hangs. Need to remove or make async the hot-path logging.

- Raycast and Alfred have native, reliable implementations
- Need to find proper macOS accessibility APIs and Rust crates
- Target: macOS first (primary platform for Script Kit)

Implement editor() prompt for Script Kit GPUI
description:
Implement a full-featured code editor prompt that maintains API compatibility with the original Monaco-based editor. Uses native GPUI components with ropey for text buffer and existing syntect for syntax highlighting.

See EDITOR_PLAN.md for comprehensive implementation details.

Key features:
- Display code with syntax highlighting (syntect)
- Text editing (insert, delete, cursor navigation)
- Selection and clipboard operations
- Undo/redo history
- Line numbers
- Submit (cmd+enter) and cancel (escape)
- Theme integration

Fix terminal input line rendering artifacts and character wrapping
description: Fix two terminal rendering bugs: 1) Previous line content bleeding into input line (ghosting/artifacts), 2) Last typed character wrapping to next line prematurely. Root cause likely in CELL_WIDTH calculation or terminal grid synchronization.

title: Research: Measure actual Menlo font glyph width and compare to assumed CELL_WIDTH
Research: Audit terminal size calculation and PTY synchronization
Fix: Correct CELL_WIDTH constant and terminal size calculation
description: Based on research: The floor rounding issue in calculate_terminal_size() causes premature wrapping. Fix by changing .floor() to .round() or using a 1-column safety buffer. Also update CELL_WIDTH to exact 8.4287 if desired.

title: Fix: Ensure line content is fully cleared between renders
description: Based on research: The line bleeding is NOT caused by size mismatch. Investigate shell escape sequences, line clearing between renders, or CELL_HEIGHT being too large (18.2px current vs 16.3px natural). May need to reduce line height or ensure rows don't overlap.

title: Test: Add visual regression test for terminal rendering

description: When global hotkey is pressed, the window should move to the current active macOS Space instead of forcing the user back to the main/original Space. Fix NSWindowCollectionBehavior from CanJoinAllSpaces to MoveToActiveSpace.

title: Update NSWindowCollectionBehavior to MoveToActiveSpace

Fix macOS Space behavior - set collection behavior BEFORE activation
description:
The previous fix changed the collection behavior value but didn't fix the order of operations. The issue is that cx.activate(true) and makeKeyAndOrderFront cause macOS to switch spaces BEFORE setCollectionBehavior is called.

Root cause: configure_as_floating_panel() is called AFTER cx.activate(true) and move_first_window_to_bounds() (which calls makeKeyAndOrderFront). By the time MoveToActiveSpace is set, the space switch has already happened.

Fix: Set the collection behavior BEFORE any activation/ordering. This must happen on EVERY show, not just the first one.

title: Refactor show logic to set collection behavior BEFORE activation
Create visual regression test for padding consistency

title: Create reusable Toast component
Add ScriptError protocol message and types
Implement ToastManager and notification queue
Capture and display script errors
Add smoke test for error handling flow
Fix terminal cutoff and typing performance
description:
Terminal has two issues based on user report:
1. Terminal content gets cut off at the bottom - likely a height/padding calculation issue
2. Typing performance is "abysmal" - likely due to excessive re-renders or processing overhead

Root cause analysis:
- Terminal height is 700px (MAX_HEIGHT) but padding calculations may be wrong
- Bottom padding uses `pb(px(padding.top))` which may not account for terminal grid row calculations
- Multiple `process()` calls per render (8x in render loop + 4x in timer) cause overhead
- Every keystroke triggers `cx.notify()` which causes full re-render
- Cell batching in render_content is good but still creates many DOM elements

title: Fix terminal height/cutoff issue
Optimize terminal typing performance

3. Audit of similar components (editor, prompts) for the same padding/performance patterns

Key areas to check:
- Terminal padding calculation (recently fixed)
- Terminal typing performance (recently optimized)
- Editor height calculations (src/editor.rs)
- Other cx.notify() patterns in main.rs that might cause render storms

title: Fix Form message not handled - silent failure with no UI or error
description:
When running a script that sends a Form message, nothing happens because:
1. The Form message type is parsed correctly (log shows it received)
2. But the message handler in execute_script_interactive has no case for Form
3. It falls through to `_ => None` and is silently discarded
4. No PromptMessage::ShowForm variant exists

Fix: Add ShowForm to PromptMessage enum, handle Message::Form in the reader, add AppView::FormPrompt, and implement basic form rendering (can show HTML with submit button).

title: Show warning toast for unhandled script messages instead of silent drop
description:
The catch-all `_ => None` at line 1922 silently drops any unhandled message types. This causes scripts to appear to do nothing when they use an unimplemented feature.

Fix: Replace silent drop with a warning toast that tells the user which message type is not yet implemented.

- E0425: cannot find value `CELL_WIDTH` in this scope
- E0425: cannot find value `CELL_HEIGHT` in this scope
- E0599: no function `calculate_terminal_size` found for TermPrompt

Lines affected: 689-993 in src/term_prompt.rs
